channel.title: linked List on PattySung
channel.description: Recent content in linked List on PattySung

item.title: Leetcode-844. Backspace String Compare
item.description: Given two strings s and t, return true if they are equal when both are typed into empty text editors.

item.title: Leetcode-143. Reorder List
item.description: You are given the head of a singly linked-list. The list can be represented as:

item.title: 328. Odd Even Linked List
item.description: Given the head of a singly linked list, group all the nodes with odd indices together followed by the nodes with even indices, and return the reordered list.

item.title: Leetcode-146. LRU Cache
item.description: Design a data structure that follows the constraints of a Least Recently Used (LRU) cache.

item.title: Leetcode-24. Swap Nodes in Pairs
item.description: Given a linked list, swap every two adjacent nodes and return its head.

item.title: Leetcode-876. Middle of the Linked List
item.description: Given the head of a singly linked list, return the middle node of the linked list.

item.title: Leetcode-148. Sort List
item.description: Given the head of a linked list, return the list after sorting it in ascending order.

item.title: Leetcode-19. Remove Nth Node From End of List
item.description: Given the head of a linked list, remove the nth node from the end of the list and return its head.

item.title: Leetcode-206. Reverse Linked List
item.description: Given the head of a singly linked list, reverse the list, and return the reversed list.

item.title: Leetcode-21. Merge Two Sorted Lists
item.description: You are given the heads of two sorted linked lists list1 and list2.

item.title: Leetcode-141. Linked List Cycle
item.description: Given head, the head of a linked list, determine if the linked list has a cycle in it.
